text: (visvasavantayini! oba veta visvasaya taba bara dena lada) visvasaharita vastun evaye ayitikaruvan veta oba bara dena lesatada, minisun atare oba viniscaya laba dunnahot (paksapati novi) sadharana lesa tindu dena lesatada niyata vasayenma allah obata niyoga karanneya. obata allah laba dena mema upadesaya Ã¦ttenma itamat aganeya. niyata vasayenma allah savan denneku vasayenda avadhanayen yutuva balanneku vasayenda sitinneya
